title.rendered: The Premier Home Builders in Los Angeles

content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_custom_heading text=”A Trusted Name in New Construction” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:center” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_empty_space height=”25″][vc_column_text]

Joel & Co. Construction is proud to be among the fastest growing custom home builders in Los Angeles, California. The company’s goal is simple — to complete each project on time and on budget by offering clear communication, careful planning, thoughtful execution, and maintaining the highest standards in home construction.

Specializing in high-quality single-family new home construction, our team works closely with architects, designers and, of course, the client, to create each unique project. Every project must fulfill a specific vision, and by transforming wood, stone, paint, and plaster, new homes come to life.

Joel & Co. has earned their reputation because of the personal care that is given to every new construction project. The company understands that building a home is much more than simply putting up walls, it is about creating a personal masterpiece. Utilizing the company’s comprehensive team of experienced contractors and craftsmen, Joel & Co. is able to offer a wide spectrum of services.

 

  • Demolition
  • Foundation Concrete
  • Framing
  • Electrical & Plumbing
  • HVAC
  • Stucco, Insulation & Drywall
  • Roofing
  • Tile and Stone
  • Cabinetry, Closets, Vanities, Moulding, Windows, Doors
  • Hardwood Floors
  • Painting & Staining
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_empty_space height=”50″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_custom_heading text=”Residential” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:center” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_empty_space height=”25″][vc_column_text]

Every project is treated with the same respect and focus regardless of size or scope. Every aspect of the process is uniquely guided for each client ⁠— from pre-design, where style, goals and budget are established, through the construction, and to the finish work, where complete satisfaction is guaranteed. From laying brick patios to designing and building premier custom homes, the superior craftsmen at Joel & Co. know what truly matters and commit fully to the vision throughout the project.

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

Joel & Co. Construction has earned a reputation as one of the best custom home builders in Los Angeles because of the personal approach we take to every new construction project. We understand that building a home is about more than putting up walls, which is why we approach every phase of the project with an acute attention to detail and quality.

With a comprehensive team of experienced contractors and craftsmen, our Los Angeles new construction residential services include:

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”50″][vc_single_image image=”2508″ alignment=”center”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_empty_space height=”50″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_custom_heading text=”Residential Services” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:center” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_empty_space height=”25″][vc_column_text]
  • New Construction
  • Custom Home Building
  • Room Addition
  • Home Renovation
  • Kitchen Remodeling
  • Bathroom Remodeling
  • Deck Building
  • Patio & Carports
  • General Repairs
  • Rough Work (Demolition, Foundation Concrete, Framing, Electrical, Plumbing, HVAC, Stucco Work, Insulation, Drywall, Roofing)
  • Tile and Stone (Granite and Stone Counters, Tile for Showers and Floors, Backsplashes for Kitchens and Bathrooms)
  • Finish Work (Cabinetry, Linen Closets, Kitchen Cabinets, Bathroom Vanities, Moulding, Windows, Doors)
  • Hardwood Floors (New Installation, Refinishing, Repair)
  • Painting (Interior, Exterior, Wood Staining)
  • Demolition
  • Foundation Concrete
  • Framing
  • Electrical & Plumbing
  • HVAC
  • Stucco, Insulation, & Drywall
  • Roofing
  • Tile and Stone
  • Cabinetry, Closets, Vanities, Moulding, Windows, Doors
  • Hardwood Floors
  • Painting & Staining
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_empty_space height=”50″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_custom_heading text=”From Foundation to Finish” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:center” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_empty_space height=”25″][vc_column_text]

Joel & Co. Construction is committed to quality without compromises, from foundation to finish. Explore the gallery to view some of the custom home projects throughout the Los Angeles area. If you’re interested in discussing your custom home project and the company’s building services in greater detail, contact the Los Angeles new construction team today for more information and receive your free project estimate.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_empty_space height=”25″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text] [/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
